wiki.category.cult.text: Tsehe aer eth sorle ni eth utcl loer est. Yb feldatu, msot pleeop with tsehe sorle aer utcl lssaiyolt, utcl srenisdi, adn aer rtap fo eth Utcl yreharchi.
wiki.category.fiends.text: Tsehe aer eth sorle ni eth isndef loer est. Yb feldatu, msot pleeop with tsehe sorle aer isndef lssaiyolt adn srenisdi.
wiki.category.modifiers.text: Tsehe aer soonipt ttha nca eb dbenela cihwh cneahg eth hiberavo fo eth agme.
wiki.category.abilities.text: Iltsiabie aer ohw aelrysp emrfrop aiscotn ni eth agme. Ot ees atwh aiscotn you nca do, ees eth lbtiiay nemu. Eth Lbtiiay nemu si erhew eth nlcrotso rof msot iltsiabie aer. Msot iltsiabie aphpne rgnuid eth ihtng, tub emso iltsiabie aphpne rgnuid eth ayd.
wiki.category.strategies.text: Eterh aer a tlo fo fpuelhl rsetgsatei ttha aelrysp seu ni rdeor ot lphe temh wni. Nwe rsetgsatei aer tarcede veeyr ayd.
wiki.article.standard.town.title: Wont
wiki.article.standard.town.text: Wont si eth nmia ogdo oanitfc. Uuallsy, eth marjtiyo fo eth aelrysp ni heca agme aer wont lssaiyolt. Yeht tndo' rsatt owknign ohw heca eohtr aer, nikeul eth inctadesy or eth utcl. Wont wsni yb ntiganelmii lla giponsop mteas (inctadesy, utcl, srosnait, rfewwleo, ect). Eth notsiwe eden ot owrk orttgeeh ot find tuo ohw eth slvei aer. Hreti nmia rewop si ni moncctnuiioam adn vgnoit, os if you aer a wiento ohw eods ont amocmtcnuie, you aer ont lgihpen yoru eamt wni.
wiki.article.standard.mafia.title: Inctadesy Yreharchi
wiki.article.standard.mafia.text:
Eth inctadesy yreharchi si eth smtesy cihwh seekp eth inctadesy egbni eabl ot klil veeyr ihtng. Eth inctadesy yreharchi si a lconciotle fo aelrysp ohw aer uuallsy laso inctadesy srenisdi adn inctadesy lssaiyolt. Eth smtesy sowlflo tow lesru:
* If eterh si a Inctadesy Gkllini loer ni eth yreharchi - uchs as Rfaheodtg or Tmosipro - wneh yeht die, theonra mmbeer fo eth yreharchi lliw iirhtne hreti loer.
* If eterh si no Inctadesy Gkllini loer ni eth yreharchi, a inctadesy mmbeer si ingev eth inctadesy ugn. Wneh eth rpelay with eth inctadesy ugn deis, theonra mmbeer fo eth yreharchi erhstini ti.

Aelrysp ttha aer ni eth inctadesy yreharchi nedt ot laso eb inctadesy srenisdi adn lssaiyolt. Ihst smnae yeht wni yb ntiganelmii veeyr eohtr eamt adn nca ktal orttgeeh rgnuid ihtng adn rytoauib.
wiki.article.standard.neutral.title: Uanterl
wiki.article.standard.neutral.text: Eursatln aer ont lla no eth amse eamt. Heca uanterl loer sha cpeilas wni dionsnicto. Msot fo temh aer atsagin tboh eth wont adn eth inctadesy. Emso uanterl sorle nca wni bfeero eth agme edsn kile eth Tsejer, Eyiuarrolvnto, adn Aysedrmoo.
wiki.article.standard.fiends.title: Isndef
wiki.article.standard.fiends.text: Isndef wni yb ntiganelmii lla giponsop mteas. Isndef aer no eth amse eamt, tub yeht t'nca amocmtcnuie ta ihtng. Isndef aer uuallsy rvey lwrofpeu adn nca klil tillmepu aelrysp ni eon ihtng. Nikeul inctadesy adn utcl, msot megas hudosl ehva ta msot eon idefn, ni nadtoiid ot eth wont adn inctadesy.
wiki.article.standard.cult.title: Utcl Yreharchi
wiki.article.standard.cult.text:
Eth utcl yreharchi si eth smtesy cihwh seekp eth utcl egbni eabl ot tirhee klil or tnvecor heca ihtng. Eth utcl yreharchi si a lconciotle fo aelrysp ohw aer uuallsy laso utcl srenisdi adn utcl lssaiyolt. Eth utcl yreharchi amatsinni 2 iltsiabie, klil adn tnvecor. Yeht aratetnel, tovinrnegc ftsri, adn gkllini rafet.
* Eth utcl nca ynol klil rafet yeht ehva fucusscelyls tcdnvoeer emoones. Rafet ttha, yeht nca ynol tnvecor rafet fucusscelyls gkllini emoones.
* If rof emso oasren a klil or tnvecor tseo'dn owrk (e.g. eth keilrl/rencrevto swa celdobk), tneh eth amse lbtiiay si reitd gaian eth tenx ihtng - ti tseo'dn cwisth. Ebauesc fo ihst, gkllini/tovinrnegc si ont nrleynhiet "veeyr eohtr ihtng".

Tsehe aer ohw eth utcl sorle eeeuctx eth etudis fo eth utcl:
* Solepta: Eth utcl yreharchi enuearsatg eterh si lysawa an solepta. If eth solepta deis, eth rpelay ohw sha neeb ni eth utcl yreharchi eth teolgsn eosmebc eth solepta. Eth s'otalsep lbtiiay si ot tnvecor aelrysp, vehweor if eterh si no otleaz, tneh eth solepta lklsi.
* Cdepiils: Eth cdepiils sha no lbtiiay. A cdepiils yma ecboem an solepta if eth solepta deis.
* Otleaz: Eth rpelay ohw sha neeb ni eth utcl yreharchi eth stehrots si eth ynol otleaz. If eterh si a otleaz, ti lliw emrfrop ikglinsl eahtrr htna eth solepta.
wiki.article.standard.minions.title: Iminnso
wiki.article.standard.minions.text:
Iminnso si a Loer Est ttha asnocitn sorle cihwh wni ynol if wont eslos. Yeht aer ont lloya ot yan occnonlusi. Yeht aelev eth agme if lla hreti simneee aer aedd. Yeht 'ertan srenisdi ot yan ogupr, os yeht tndo' amocmtcnuie ta ihtng.

Emso Iminnso cdiunle:
* Whitc
* Secrwrcao
* Kippradne
* Repwar
wiki.article.standard.whisper.title: Rhwisep
wiki.article.standard.whisper.text:
Rgnuid eth ayd, as nglo as you nca akeps ni lla ahct, you nca rhwisep ot yan eohtr iigvln rpelay
- Inshrgipwe dssne a ievaprt ahct seesmag ot eth rpelay you csohe
- Ot rhwisep emoones, seu eth rhwisep cmmando or noep eth rhwisep necanlh giusn eth ntbout ni eth tslayilrep
   - Eth rhwisep cmmando si "\w#" erhew "#" si drelcape with eth rpelay buenrm fo eth rpelay you atnw ot rhwisep, os "\2w Hey, my loer si whitc!" ipehssrw ot rpelay @2
- Wneh you rhwisep emoones, a seesmag si tesn ni lla ahct siagyn ttha you dsiprheew ot eth rpelay you csohe, os rneeeyov snowk ttha you dsiprheew ttha rpelay
 - You t'nca rhwisep ot an cnasdiefrhne rpelay
 - If you try ot dnes an ailnidv rhwisep you aer tesn a ahct seesmag siagyn ttha you ctna rhwisep.
wiki.article.standard.tag.title: Tga
wiki.article.standard.tag.text: Gats aer ocins sohnw tenx ot rpelay esamn ni eth rpelay nemu. Gats nca eb eaddd or rvmeedo yb emso sorle. Gats nca show nnmiioftaro kile ohw eth gadrstehfo upkcab si, ohw si eth Eyiuarrolvnto trgaet, ohw eth nmiactroi sha agdegt, ect. Aelrysp aer lotd wneh yeht igna adn oesl gats no eohtr aelrysp.
wiki.article.standard.reveal.title: Vreael
wiki.article.standard.reveal.text:
- Wneh a rpelay si elrdeaev ot you, you nca ees hreti loer lbael, adn you aer ingev a seesmag siagyn hreti loer
- Wneh a rpelay si lnaeoedcc mofr you, you oesl hreti loer lbael, adn aer ingev a ahct seesmag siagyn yeht aer lnaeoedcc fmro you
    - A rpelay sgte lnaeoedcc wneh yeht die or cwisth sorle.

 Eelnagrvi adn loer belals aer ievaprt. os if you ees a loer lbael, sretoh thimg ont laso ees ttha loer lbael. Srenisdi aer lysawa elrdeaev ot heca eohtr. of__r Xa__eeplm inctadesy.
wiki.article.standard.roleLabel.title: Loer Lbael
wiki.article.standard.roleLabel.text:
- Loer belals eaparp tenx ot rpelay esamn, ti wsosh atwh loer ttha rpelay si
- Loer belals aer ont lysawa plbuic, rof xemealp, you nca ees yoru onw loer lbael ta lla mties, tub eohtr aelrysp nca ont
- A inctadesy mmbeer nca ees eth eohtr inctadesy meremsb loer belals
- Wneh you igna a loer lbael no theonra rpelay, you get a ahct seesmag siagyn ttha aelrysp loer swa elrdeaev ot you
- Wneh you oesl a loer lbael no theonra rpelay, you get a ahct seesmag siagyn ttha aelrysp loer swa lnaeoedcc mofr you
- If a rpelay ttha si elrdeaev ot you ishswcet sorle or deis, hreti loer lbael lliw eb lnaeoedcc
- Aedd aelrysp nca ont ehva loer belals, eth loer ttha sapprea tenx ot hreti eanm si jsut eth loer no hreti eravg. Tsehe nca eb taiaccurne rof nossear kile eth nmiactroi or frroges' lbtiiay
wiki.article.standard.trial.title: Railt
wiki.article.standard.trial.text:
Alisrt aer ohw aelrysp get tdove tuo.
Alisrt aer rafet indsocsusi adn bfeero skdu.
Railt sespah go ni ihst rdeor
- Iomotnnnai
- Osytmtnie
- Tedgumjen
- Lniaf Wdsor

A rpelay si maneontid rafet ggntiet tdove yb rome htna half fo eth iigvln aelrysp
Rafet egbni maneontid, rgnuid osytmtnie, eth maneontid rpelay asktl no hreti onw
Rafet osytmtnie, rgnuid tedgumjen, rneeeyov oesvt ltuigy, oitnncen, or ibstsaan. If eterh aer rome ltuigy oesvt htna oitnncen oesvt, eth agme geso ot lniaf wdsor, ieoreswht ti geso bakc ot iomotnnnai
Rgnuid lniaf wdsor, eth rpelay ohw swa tdove ltuigy sasy emso lniaf wdsor adn tneh si euctdexe adn deis
Eterh nca ynol eb pu ot 3 iomotnnnai sespah per ayd. If 3 alisrt aphpne adn no rpelay si euctdexe, skdu ststar
wiki.article.standard.interview.title: Enietrwvi
wiki.article.standard.interview.text: A erroretp nca enietrwvi a rpelay rgnuid eth ihtng, ogwlialn eth erroretp ot akeps with temh. Eth rpelay egbni evditeewnir yma ont wonk ohw eth erroretp si, tub rneeeyov snowk eth erroretp si no eth wont eamt.
wiki.article.standard.report.title: Erprto
wiki.article.standard.report.text: Eth erroretp sha a erprto cihwh si tepods ilylbupc veeyr rytoauib eth erroretp eoohscs ot. Rneeeyov snowk eth erprto swa irwttne yb eth erroretp os yeht wonk eth nnmiioftaro si suwttyhrtor. Eth erroretp yma enietrwvi a rpelay heca ihtng ot igna nnmiioftaro ot cdiunle ni eth erprto.
wiki.article.standard.forged.title: Orfeg
wiki.article.standard.forged.text: A rpelay ohw si ferdgo had hreti ibila adn loer hecagnd yb eth roerfg no hreti eravg.
wiki.article.standard.visit.title: Itsvi
wiki.article.standard.visit.text:
Vtisis aer eth erco fo eth agme
- Aelrysp nca itsvi eohtr aelrysp ot seu hreti iltsiabie
- Alctiyylp, gnicshoo a rpelay with a loer lbtiiay ucseas you ot itsvi eth chsneo rpelay, othlhuag eterh aer nyma exiscepnto
- Vtisis nca etsor axrte fagls uchs as "gkiatcant", ihst smnae ti yma ttecirna with ncreiat sorle rieeltdynff

 Hree aer emso pslmaexe fo ohw vtisis thimg owrk
- @7 si a Tcevetdei ohw eoohscs @71, os @7 vtisis @71 adn salner a eutsrl batuo @71
 No eth amse ihtng @10 si a tuokool ohw laso eoohscs @71. Os @10 salner ttha @7 sditeiv hreti trgaet.
- Eterh si vengaliti, ohw eoohscs ot hsoot @30. Ta eth amse emit, eterh si an enngeeri ohw sha hreti tapr est no @30. Eth nnegsreie tapr lklsi eth vengaliti ebauesc eth vengaliti si invtisig @30 with an gkiatcant itsvi
- A vtisis trgaet nca eb hecagnd otwutih eth ritsovi veen owknign, rof xemealp, eth iltsiabie fo Nretorsatpr, Repwar, adn Whitc auces vtisis atretsg ot cneahg.
wiki.article.standard.target.title: Trgaet
wiki.article.standard.target.text:
Yoru trgaet si eth rpelay ohw you itsvi.
- A itsvi tgatriegn emoones smnae ttha eth ritsovi si invtisig ttha rpelay
wiki.article.standard.indirect.title: Eiindcrt
wiki.article.standard.indirect.text:
An eiindcrt lbtiiay si eon ttha eods ont itsvi. Terhfoere, ti si bulnea ot eb seen yb a tuokool or krrctae or deefactf yb nyma eohtr iltsiabie.fR_o Peem_lxa:
- If a amrknmsa atscatk a rpelay with eth nnegsreie tapr no temh, as nglo as eth amrknmsa eods ont itsvi eth dartppe rpelay, eth tapr sitn' est ffo, veen wneh eth kemrad rpelay si tekacatd. Ihst si ebauesc eth ctkata si eiindcrt.
wiki.article.standard.hypnotize.title: Zhyetopni
wiki.article.standard.hypnotize.text: A rpelay ohw si eoyhnitdzp swa a yphsontits trgaet. Yeht ylliepttnoa aer lotd a fake seesmag mofr eth ntiyhspot. Yeht yma ehva neeb eordobcelkl.
wiki.article.standard.frame.title: Efram
wiki.article.standard.frame.text: A rpelay ohw si rafmed swa a seafrmr trgaet.
wiki.article.standard.convert.title: Tnvecor
wiki.article.standard.convert.text:
A lre'spya loer si hecagnd. Lla fo hreti lbtiiay uses aer feelirdl ot iummamx. fR_o Xemealp:_
- If emoones si tcdnvoeer ot a Aevntre, yeht get lla hrete lbtiiay uses.
- An Solepta nca tnvecor aelrysp toni stltiucs.
wiki.article.standard.roleblock.title: Rloekocbl
wiki.article.standard.roleblock.text: A rpelay ohw si eordobcelkl sha hreti vtisis eadser. A lre'spya vtisis egbni eadser tfone smnae yeht t'nca seu hreti lbtiiay. Emso sorle aer inumme or ont deefactf yb egbni eordobcelkl. Roects adn Ntiyhspot aer sorle ttha nca rloekocbl eohtr aelrysp adn aer tboh inumme ot egbni eordobcelkl.
wiki.article.standard.ward.title: Adwr
wiki.article.standard.ward.text:
Emoones nca eb eardwd. Aeonyn ohw vtisis a rpelay ohw si eardwd sha lla hreti vtisis eadser adn eisceevr a ahct seesmag siagyn ttha yeht aer blrcedwdkoa. fR_o Peem_lxa:
- A ceunbro sectels a rpelay ot adwr heca ihtng
- Eth orjlia psut a rpelay ni ljai, irdwgan temh.

 Emso sorle aer abwordkcl inumme
- A tsejer nca klil emoones veen if eyterh' eardwd
wiki.article.standard.block.title: Okblc
wiki.article.standard.block.text: A rpelay ohw si celdobk swa tirhee eordobcelkl, blrcedwdkoa, or tboh. A rpelay sitn' celdobk if eyterh' inumme
wiki.article.standard.jail.title: Ljai
wiki.article.standard.jail.text: A Orjlia nca tpu a rpelay ni ljai. Wneh a rpelay si ni ljai, yeht nca ktal with eth Orjlia ta ihtng, eth Orjlia nca hocseo ot eeeuctx temh, yeht t'nca cetels aeonyn. Eth jeliad rpelay si eardwd, os msot iltsiabie agnitc no temh ifla, gminean hreti sfea mofr msot atscatk or ivignsntoaetis.
wiki.article.standard.rampage.title: Gpaerma
wiki.article.standard.rampage.text: Lla viirssto ot a apadgrem rpelay aer nedciltiyr tekacatd. Eth gpaerma hsares eth ctkata vleel fo eth arpgamgni caaterhcr.
wiki.article.standard.possess.title: Sosssep
wiki.article.standard.possess.text:
A rpelay ohw si esesospds swa fcrdeo toni invtisig emoones.
- Sorle kile Whitc, adn Iobittirursten, ehva eth lbtiiay ot sosssep aelrysp
- Emso sorle aer inumme ot egbni esesospds, kile whitc, adn iobittirursten
- If a loer vtisis tillmepu pleeop, ynol eth ftsri itsvi si hecagnd wneh esesospds
- You t'nca eb esesospds toni emoones if yoru loer tseo'dn olalw you ot cetels temh. If a eduimm si esesospds, yeht itlls tndo' itsvi aeonyn

of__r Xa__eeplm:

@1 eth vengaliti sectels @7 ni pshoe fo inogoths temh.
Wneh ihtng edsn @1 sgte a seesmag siagyn yeht reew esesospds.
Eth tenx rytoauib, yeht ees ttha @2 swa osth asetndi.
Ihst si ebauesc @4 si eth whitc, ohw esesospds @1 toni inogoths @2.

of__r Xa__eeplm:

Eth ppsehohorli sectels @8 adn @12, tub yeht aer esesospds toni @15
Eth ppsehohorli tllaaucy sditeiv @15 adn @12, ynol eth ftsri itsvi swa hecagnd
wiki.article.standard.defense.title: Fdeenes
wiki.article.standard.defense.text:
Atscatk adn fdeenes ehva 3 treis heca. An ctkata nca tirhee eb absic, mrpga-rciroeni, or iirppotecogerintc-n.

A fdeenes nca tirhee eb rreodma, ctdoeeptr, or vnicnleiib.

A absic ctkata nca ont klil a rpelay ohw si rreodma, adn an mrpga-rciroeni ctkata nca ont klil a rpelay ohw si ctdoeeptr. A iirppotecogerintc-n ctkata nca oopeverwr raorm as lwel as nooreicttp.

 Emso sorle ehva raorm yb feldatu, uuallsy veil noes. Nooreicttp nca eb grndeta ot aelrysp hgotuhr iltsiabie kile eth To'rodsc lbtiiay ot ceoprtt hreti trgaet. A rpelay with vnicnleiib fdeenes nca ynol die yb ggntiet euctdexe or lnaevgi eth agme.

Unesls ieoreswht etddinaci, atscatk aer absic yb feldatu adn lliw ont eb eabl ot klil aelrysp ohw aer rreodma or ctdoeeptr. Eiindcrt si ont a trie fo ctkata.
wiki.article.standard.protect.title: Ceoprtt
wiki.article.standard.protect.text: Ceoprtt smnae ot naercesi ensoesmo' fdeenes ot ctdoeeptr. Eth nooreicttp lliw ynol slta eth ihtng unesls ieoreswht etddinaci. A ctdoeeptr rpelay si lotd wneh yeht aer tekacatd tub asvde yb nooreicttp
wiki.article.standard.dead.title: Aedd
wiki.article.standard.dead.text: If a rpelay si aedd, yeht t'nca eotv, hreti eravg lliw llkeiy eb ni eth aagvrdrye, adn yeht uuallsy t'nca seu hreti lbtiiay meronay. Aedd aelrysp nca ynol akeps with eohtr aedd aelrysp with eth oitecxpne fo eth Eduimm adn sti trgaet. A rpelay esden ot die ot ecboem aedd. Lla aelrysp rsatt eth agme veali! (Atwh ddi you xtcpee…)
wiki.article.standard.silenced.title: Sniceel
wiki.article.standard.silenced.text:
A rpelay ohw si csdelien nca ont ktal or ieoreswht amocmtcnuie rgnuid ttha ayd.
- Yeht t'nca omtienna rgnuid eth iomotnnnai eapsh ebauesc yeht aer fcrdeo ot iofretf hreti eotv
- Yeht nca itlls eotv rgnuid eth tedgumjen eapsh
- If eth csdelien rpelay si tpu no railt, yeht itlls t'nca ktal
- If eth aelrysp aer laingkt tuo olud, csdelien aelrysp hudosl ont akeps or seu yan ypte fo moncctnuiioam, uicgdnnil iaglsns or faialc isoexernsps. Eth luer si, fo a rpelay t'nca seu ahct, yeht aer ont dleowla ot amocmtcnuie
- Sorle kile eupdyt yramo adn orjlia nca itlls seu hreti iltsiabie yarnlolm rgnuid eth ayd veen if csdelien

 A Iacraebllkm nca sniceel a rpelay heca ihtng.
wiki.article.standard.friends.title: Srdfine
wiki.article.standard.friends.text:
If 2 aelrysp nca wni eth amse agme, yeht aer srdfine.
 - A tsejer nca wni ni eth amse agme as a tcevetdei, os yeht aer srdfine
- An Solepta nca wni ni eth amse agme as a cdepiils os yeht aer srdfine
- A rfaheodtg t'nca wni ni eth amse agme as a tcevetdei, yeht tboh eden eth eohtr ot oesl, os yeht aer simneee
- A aetoeintrm si srdfine with a prteeupep adn simneee with a eduimm
 Eth ppsehohorli, tcevetdei, adn sgopis, nca seu hreti iltsiabie ot ees if pleeop aer srdfine or simneee, othlhuag auras nca fecetf tsehe rsstleu.

 A rpelay nca laso eb srdfine with ciossncnulo. If you nca wni with wont tneh you aer srdfine with wont, rof xemealp, a tcevetdei si srdfine with wont tub simneee with inctadesy.
wiki.article.standard.enemies.title: Simneee
wiki.article.standard.enemies.text:
If 2 aelrysp eden eth eohtr ot oesl ni rdeor rof vehsetmsel ot wni, yeht aer simneee.
- A Litpoicina t'nca wni nlsdgoiea a yramo, os yeht aer simneee.
- A rfaheodtg t'nca wni ni eth amse agme as a orjlia, os yeht aer simneee.
- A tsejer nca wni ni eth amse agme as a tcevetdei, os yeht aer srdfine.
- An Solepta t'nca wni with a rfaheodtg, os yeht aer simneee.

 Eth ppsehohorli, tcevetdei, adn sgopis, nca seu hreti iltsiabie ot ees if pleeop aer srdfine or simneee, othlhuag auras nca fecetf tsehe rsstleu.
wiki.article.standard.loyalist.title: Lylasiot
wiki.article.standard.loyalist.text:
A rpelay ohw si a lylasiot wsni if adn ynol if eth occnonlusi hreti lloya ot si cehrdae.
 - A Tcevetdei si uuallsy a wont lylasiot
 -  A Tsejer si uuallsy ont lloya ot yan wni oninticod, hreti wni oninticod si tpnnedeinde, (Veen if yeht aer srdfine with wont, yeht 'ertan a wont lylasiot).

 Aelrysp ohw aer lloya ot rdfetenfi ciossncnulo utms eb simneee.
 Aelrysp nca ynol eb lloya ot agme ciossncnulo
 - "Tsejer" sitn' a occnonlusi os eterh si no "Tsejer Lylasiot".
wiki.article.standard.insider.title: Eniidrs
wiki.article.standard.insider.text:
An eniidrs ogupr si a ogupr fo aelrysp ohw ehva eth loinolgfw eeiptrspor
 - Yeht ehva eth loer fo lla eohtr iigvln srenisdi ni hreti ogupr elrdeaev ot temh
 - Yeht ehva a ihtng ahct ogupr with lla eohtr iigvln srenisdi

 Rof xemealp, A caitlpy Rfaheodtg si a Inctadesy Eniidrs, yeht ehva eth sorle fo lla inctadesy srenisdi elrdeaev adn nca ktal ot temh ta ihtng.
 Noaitrmstee aer Prteeupep Srenisdi
 Ciedteestv aer ont tfone Wont Srenisdi ebauesc yeht tndo' ehva a ihtng ahct or ehva lla wont srenisdi elrdeaev ot temh.
 Theonra eanm rof eniidrs si "mmbeer". A rpelay si a inctadesy eniidrs or inctadesy mmbeer if yeht aer ni eth inctadesy eniidrs ogupr
Emso pslmaexe fo eniidrs psguro aer:
    - Inctadesy
    - Utcl
    - Prteeupep
wiki.article.standard.conclusion.title: Occnonlusi
wiki.article.standard.conclusion.text:
Eth agme ynol edsn wneh a occnonlusi si ddeicde. Msot aelrysp wni dionsnicto lliw edpend no eth occnonlusi ddeicde.
- Emso pslmaexe fo ciossncnulo aer:
    - Wont
    - Inctadesy
    - Utcl
    - Isndef
    - Icne Slti
    - Arwd

- A agme occnonlusi si tdnmieeder cgroiancd ot eth loinolgfw lesru
    - If lla aelrysp ohw aer *tdnoecu rof eth agme occnonlusi hkcec* aer srdfine with a occnonlusi, ttha occnonlusi wsni.
        - If eterh aer no aelrysp egnimainr, eth agme edsn ni a arwd
    - A rpelay si ynol *tdnoecu rof eth agme occnonlusi hkcec* if yan fo eth loinolgfw si reut
        - Hreti loer si ni eth inctadesy gkllini loer est, or hreti loer si ni eth isndef loer est
        - Yeht aer a wont lylasiot
        - Yeht aer a inctadesy eniidrs
wiki.article.standard.role.title: Loer
wiki.article.standard.role.text:
Veeyr rpelay sha a loer. Hreti loer iedsneemrt atwh hreti lbtiiay si.
 of__r xemealp:__ Aifomso si a loer with eth lbtiiay ot klil a rpelay heca ihtng.
 Yb feldatu, a Loer iedsneemrt atwh a aelrysp wni oninticod si, adn atwh yeht psguro yeht aer srenisdi ni. Vehweor, ihst nca cneahg ued ngtsih uchs as prteeupep gihgcann a aelrysp wni oninticod tub ont hreti loer.
wiki.article.standard.haunt.title: Htuna
wiki.article.standard.haunt.text: Rafet yeht die, a Eduimm nca htuna a iigvln rpelay ot olalw temh ot amocmtcnuie with eth aedd rgnuid eth ihtng. Eth huentda rpelay si eaddd ot eth aedd ahct ogupr ta ihtng. If tillmepu mmiudse htuna tillmepu aelrysp, yeht nca lla akeps with heca eohtr adn lla aedd aelrysp.
wiki.article.standard.transport.title: Tstparnro
wiki.article.standard.transport.text:
If you aer antdprerost, tneh lla vtisis ot you aer edetdcrrei ot emoones eles
- A nretorsatpr nca tstparnro tow aelrysp with heca eohtr, gminean ttha aeonyn ohw vtisis eth ftsri rpelay asetndi vtisis eth encdos, adn aeonyn ohw vtisis eth encdos rpelay asetndi vtisis eth ftsri
- A repwar nca tstparnro eon rpelay ot theonra, gminean aeonyn ohw vtisis eth ftsri rpelay asetndi vtisis eth encdos, tub ont eth eohtr ayw duaorn.
wiki.article.standard.innocent.title: Oitnncen
wiki.article.standard.innocent.text: Vgnoit rof emoones ot ont eb euctdexe rgnuid tedgumjen eapsh. If eterh aer rome ltuigy oesvt htna oitnncen noes, eth rpelay no railt si euctdexe.
wiki.article.standard.guilty.title: Ltuigy
wiki.article.standard.guilty.text: A ltuigy eotv rgnuid eth tedgumjen eapsh si a eotv rof eth rpelay no railt ot eb euctdexe. If eterh aer rome Ltuigy oesvt htna Oitnncen oesvt, eth rpelay no railt si euctdexe.
wiki.article.standard.abstain.title: Iabastn
wiki.article.standard.abstain.text: Nnaibasgit si wneh a rpelay eods ont eotv rgnuid a Unjetdgm eapsh. If lla aelrysp Iabastn, tneh eth rpelay no railt si ont euctdexe.
wiki.article.standard.obscured.title: Sorubce
wiki.article.standard.obscured.text: A rpelay ohw si rsceubod had hreti loer adn ibila eadser mofr hreti eravg. A Nmiactroi nca tga aelrysp rof oisrungcb, tneh wneh yeht die, yeht aer rsceubod.
wiki.article.standard.evil.title: Veil
wiki.article.standard.evil.text: If a loer si veil, ti smnae a loer si t-ononnw. A pcscyhi nca ivercee veil osnivsi ot lnera ohw si ont no wont. A tcevetdei lliw ees emoones as ispuiossuc if yeht aer veil or ehva a ispuiossuc raua.
wiki.article.standard.roleLimit.title: Loer Ilmit
wiki.article.standard.roleLimit.text:
A sorle ilmit si eth iummamx buenrm fo ttha loer ttha nca eb aeedtreng ta eth rsatt fo a rgraleu agme. If eterh si no ilmit, eterh nca eb yan buenrm fo ttha loer.
- Aevntre sha a loer ilmit fo 1, eterh nca ynol eb eon aevntre, if 2 pleeop mailc aevntre, eon utms eb nligy
- Lacrwddi utms edaher ot loer ilmit
wiki.article.standard.douse.title: Soude
wiki.article.standard.douse.text: Rssoasitn nca soude aelrysp, tneh aetlr ngeiti, ot ctkata rneeeyov ohw si eusddo. If eterh si an srosnait veali tneh eusddo aelrysp ehva a ispuiossuc raua. Inntiigg si an eiindcrt, iirppotecogerintc-n ctkata ot lla eusddo aelrysp.
wiki.article.standard.spiral.title: Rsilap
wiki.article.standard.spiral.text: UIMUKAZ nca ntiuefaat aelrysp, cihwh ucseas temh ot rsilap. Ngrailisp aelrysp aer ont lotd yeht aer ngrailisp, adn yeht die eth tenx ihtng. Viirssto ot ngrailisp aelrysp rsatt ot rsilap. Gdiyn ued ot ngrailisp si an eiindcrt, mrpga-rciroeni ctkata.
wiki.article.standard.backup.title: Upkcab
wiki.article.standard.backup.text:
Eth inctadesy nca hocseo a rpelay ot eb eth upkcab. If lla eth inctadesy gkllini iltsiabie aer celdobk, tneh eth upkcab atscatk hreti trgaet asetndi asetndi.
- Eth upkcab nca cetels a rdfetenfi trgaet mofr eth eohtr gkllini lbtiiay
- Eth eohtr gkllini lbtiiay udocl eb a inctadesy gkllini loer or a rpelay with eth ugn
wiki.article.standard.confused.title: Uncseofd
wiki.article.standard.confused.text:
Eth loer fo a rpelay ohw si uncseofd thimg ont cnntuoif lrecyotrc. Uncseofd eastcff heca loer rieeltdynff. You thimg ont eb lotd ttha you aer uncseofd.
 Ohw ihst eastcff veeyr loer:
   - Nosop: You aer lysawa lotd ttha you t'nca ltle
   - Tcevetdei: You aer lysawa lotd oitnncen
   - Ppsehohorli: You aer lysawa lotd srdfine
   - Sgopis: You aer lysawa lotd ttha yoru trgaet dtidn' itsvi an yeenm
   - Pcscyhi: You aer lotd a nmodar slti fo 3 aelrysp rof yoru veil ionsiv, You aer lotd a nmodar slti fo 2 aelrysp rof yoru ogdo ionsiv.
 - Lytal Eklrc: You aer lotd tirhee 1 rome or 1 ssle htna eth ctrerco buenrm you hudosl eb lotd. If ti ulwdo edcexe eth buenrm fo aelrysp ohw tdove ltuigy, ti si ttha buenrm asetndi. If ti reew ot go udnre 0, ti si 0 asetndi.
 - Oautidr: You get nmodar sorle, yeht thimg eb ctrerco or rnreioctc. You aer ynol lotd sorle ttha udocl ehva omce mofr ttha tlos.
wiki.article.standard.marionette.title: Rtnisg Pu
wiki.article.standard.marionette.text:
A rpelay ohw si a aetoeintrm sha ejniod a rdfetenfi eamt
- Yeht peke hreti dol loer wneh yeht ecboem a aetoeintrm
- Yeht aer tekacatd veeyr ihtng yb eth loer ttha teidcreur temh with a nooreicttp grnepici ctkata(EX. Ueretcirr or Prteeupep)
- If eterh aer no aelrysp with eth loer ttha teidcreur temh, eth aetoeintrm si itlls tekacatd
- Eth aetoeintrm no lenogr wsni with hreti garioinl eamt tub wsni with eth nwe eamt asetndi
wiki.article.standard.aura.title: Raua
wiki.article.standard.aura.text:
An raua si a atstus fecetf tpu no a rpelay ttha ucseas temh ot seegrrit rieeltdynff ot vesvattingeii iltsiabie.
 - Rof xemealp, a Tcevetdei sees yan aelrysp with a ispuiossuc raua as simneee ot wont, veen if yeht aer srdfine with wont
 - Ot wonk ohw oitnncen raua or ispuiossuc raua thimg fecetf an lbtiiay, ot go eth lunmaa pgae rof ttha loer.

 Hree aer pslmaexe fo iltsiabie ttha thimg auces a rpelay ot ehva an raua.
 - Afemrr viesg a rpelay ispuiossuc raua rof a ihtng
 - Gadrstehfo ehva an oitnncen raua, veen if eyterh' eordobcelkl
 - Iisedgsur nca igve a rpelay an oitnncen raua rof eon ihtng

If a rpelay sha tboh an oitnncen adn ispuiossuc raua ta eth amse emit, eth ispuiossuc raua *uuallsy* sriordvee.
 - A rpelay with an oitnncen raua adn a ispuiossuc raua tsiergesr as simneee with wont cgroiancd ot a tcevetdei
wiki.article.standard.appearedVisit.text:
A rpelay udocl par_a_pe ot ehva sditeiv emoones, veen hguhot yeht dtidn'. Ihst si uuallsy ducesa yb veil sorle uchs as Afemrr.

Ihst ynol eastcff vesvattingeii sorle.

ePa_xesl_m

Eth Krrctae adn Tuokool nca ees eth draeeapp itsvi, tub ont eth rale itsvi.

A Aevntre tseo'dn ctkata a rpelay ohw draeeapp ot itsvi temh adn dtidn' tllaaucy itsvi temh.
wiki.article.standard.roleOutline.title: Loer Lnoutie
wiki.article.standard.roleOutline.text:
A loer lnoutie esnifed a ogupr fo sorle.

Sutoienl nca tirhee eb a fiedneredp loer est, an etcxa loer, or a onnui fo tillmepu.

ePa_xesl_m

"Yan" Ti udocl eb yan loer

"Uanterl" Udocl eb yan sbesolpi uanterl loer.

"Wont Pousprt" Udocl eb an Roects, Iobittirursten, Nretorsatpr, or Eduimm

"Rfaheodtg" Udocl ynol eb a Rfaheodtg.

"Lacrwddi ∪ Pcscyhi" Udocl tirhee eb an Lacrwddi or Pcscyhi.

- Wneh sorle aer aeedtreng anrymdlo mofr a loer lnoutie, heca sbesolpi loer si lyuelqa llkeiy ot neagtere.
- Loer sutoienl aer edus ni eth lnoutie slti ot show atwh sorle udocl eb ni eth agme.
wiki.article.standard.outlineList.title: Lnoutie Slti
wiki.article.standard.outlineList.text:
Eth lnoutie slti esnifed atwh sorle aer ni eth agme. Wneh eth agme ststar:
- Heca loer lnoutie eegantesr a nmodar loer mofr eth sorle ni eth lnoutie
- Heca rpelay si eanissgd ot a loer lnoutie, adn terhfoere a loer.
wiki.article.standard.chatGroup.title: Ahct Ogupr
wiki.article.standard.chatGroup.text:
Lla gmesasse aer tirhee ievaprt or tesn eon fo tsehe ahct psguro
 - Lla 🔊 (Eth onic tseo'dn yspdlia tenx ot gmesasse, You aer dleowla ot akeps tuo olud if you nca dnes ot "Lla" ahct) 
 - Aedd 💀
 - Inctadesy 🌹
 - Utcl 🕯️
 - Ljai 🔒
 - Enietrwvi 📝

 Aelrysp nca eb ni tillmepu ahct psguro ta enoc, or veen dear ahct psguro yeht aer ont ni.
 - 🔇 Smnae you aer ont ni eth "Lla" ahct ogupr adn aer *ont dleowla ot akeps tuo olud*
 - 🔮 smnae ttha a iigvln rpelay tesn a seesmag ot eth aedd ahct ogupr
 - ✉️ smnae ttha eth seesmag swa tesn ypalirvte
wiki.article.standard.fastForward.title: Satf Fwardor
wiki.article.standard.fastForward.text: If lla iigvln aelrysp eotv ot satf fwardor, eth cuernrt eapsh ylttninsa edsn. Vgnoit ot satf fwardor si oteyplmcle unoynosam, noybod veen snowk wneh you srspe eth ntbout. Ot eotv ot satf fwardor, srspe eth satf fwardor ntbout ni eth top tlfe.
wiki.article.standard.forfeitVote.title: Iofretf Iomotnnnai Eotv
wiki.article.standard.forfeitVote.text:
Ortffneigi yoru eotv smnae you aer ont eabl ot eotv rgnuid eth iomotnnnai eapsh tub you nca itlls eotv rgnuid eth tedgumjen eapsh. Rgnuid indsocsusi, aelrysp nca hocseo ot iofretf hreti eotv giusn eth ntbout ta eth top fo eth tslayilrep. Enoc Iomotnnnai ststar, yeht t'nca cneahg hreti dmin.
- Rneeeyov salner ohw ieodtrffe hreti eotv wneh iomotnnnai ststar ni eth fmro fo a tga
- Rof heca rpelay ohw oetrfifs hreti eotv, eth ntuoam fo oesvt ednede rof a railt resesecda ynccarligod
- Aelrysp ohw aer csdelien aer fcrdeo ot iofretf hreti eotv

 Ti si nroglyts orcdenmeedm ot erevn eevr iofretf yoru eotv unesls you aer csdelien or ritngpeedn ot eb csdelien
wiki.article.standard.loveLinked.title: Evol Klni
wiki.article.standard.loveLinked.text: 2 aelrysp ohw aer evol lkedni aer lotd ohw heca eohtr aer. If eon deis, eth eohtr deis fo a nroebk etahr. Pciud nca evol klni aelrysp. Os nca eth evol klni agme dfimioer.
wiki.article.standard.howToPlay.title: Ohw Ot Ypal
wiki.article.standard.howToPlay.text:
Eth galo fo eth agme deepnds no yoru loer. Msot sorle wni if lla aelrysp mofr giponsop mteas aer iintemdale
Eth mteas aer Wont, Inctadesy, Utcl, Isndef
- Wont hudosl try ot find tuo ohw eth inctadesy si ni rdeor ot eotv temh tuo
- Inctadesy, utcl, adn isndef, hudosl try ot syat hidnde liwhe gkllini notsiwe

Eth agme surn ni sespah fo ayd adn ihtng
- Rgnuid ihtng, heca rpelay uses hreti sorle iltsiabie
- Rgnuid eth ayd, aelrysp csiusds nnmiioftaro yeht ldrneea adn eotv no a rpelay ot klil

Eterh aer epbushass ihintw ayd adn ihtng

# Ihtng
Msot loer iltsiabie owrk ta ihtng. Hree aer emso pslmaexe
- Heca ihtng, eth rfaheodtg nca cetels a rpelay ot klil temh
- Heca ihtng, eth tcevetdei nca cetels a rpelay. Eth tcevetdei si lotd if eth rpelay yeht cetels si oitnncen or ispuiossuc. Ihst ulwdo lphe eth tcevetdei find tuo ohw eth inctadesy si. If yeht aer ispuiossuc yeht aer a wont yeenm
- Heca ihtng, eth afemrr nca cetels a rpelay ot eamk temh seegrrit seyafll ot eth tcevetdei. Os a wiento udocl seegrrit as ispuiossuc ot a tcevetdei seyafll if a afemrr edus hreti lbtiiay

# Rytoauib
Rgnuid eth rytoauib eapsh, rneeeyov si lotd ohw ided, nlgao with eth loer adn ibila fo shote ohw ided.
Lla aelrysp hudosl peke hreti ibila teon pgae ot peke ktrca fo lla eth nnmiioftaro yeht ldrneea rgnuid eth agme. Eth rytoauib eapsh si a ftercpe emit ot ewitr wodn ni yoru ibila atwh you ldrneea slta ihtng. Rof xemealp:

- If uoe'yr a tcevetdei ohw ldrneea ttha @5 si ispuiossuc no ihtng 1. You udocl ewitr yoru ibila ot oklo kile ihst

Tcevetdei
Ihtng 1: @5 - ispuiossuc

Ti si laso iapnotrtm rof onn wiento aelrysp ot peke a fake ibila ot pnertde ttha yeht aer a wiento

# Indsocsusi
Eth indsocsusi eapsh si erhew aelrysp csiusds eth nnmiioftaro yeht ldrneea adn try ot find tuo ohw eth inctadesy, isndef, adn utcl aer
Aelrysp lliw ksa heca eohtr ot mailc, ihst smnae yeht atnw ot wonk eth nnmiioftaro ttha eth eohtr rpelay ldrneea
Msot aelrysp dnes hreti ibila ni ahct rgnuid ihst eapsh, ot hersa eth nnmiioftaro lycetffinie ni oepersns ot egbni saked ot mailc. Ti lliw llkeiy eb iedcnsedor ispuiossuc ot ont ehva an ibila ppdraere wneh saked rof eon. Os sti rvey iapnotrtm ot ehva eon ppdraere, no attmre ohw you aer

# Iomotnnnai
Rgnuid iomotnnnai, aelrysp nca eotv eohtr aelrysp no ot railt ni rdeor ot eeeuctx temh
Eth steb ayw rof notsiwe ot klil inctadesy meremsb si ot seu hreti eotv, veen if you eran’t ncreiat emoones si veil, vgnoit temh tnoo railt adn netgrthniea temh lliw tfone igve nnmiioftaro ot lphe find inctadesy
- If rome htna half fo eth iigvln aelrysp eotv rof eon rpelay, ttha rpelay si tpu no railt
- If eterh eran’t eunhgo oesvt ni emit, eth agme sipks rceldyti ot skdu

# Osytmtnie
- Eth rpelay tdove no larit si eth ynol rpelay dleowla ot akeps adn ahct rgnuid ihst eapsh, yeht hudosl alnirecyt mailc, dnes hreti ibila adn say atwh hreti loer si

# Tedgumjen
- Rneeeyov oesvt oitnncen or ltuigy (or ibstsaan)
- If rome aelrysp eotv ltuigy htna oitnncen, eth rpelay no railt lliw eb euctdexe
- If eth rpelay no railt isn’t euctdexe, eterh si theonra larit (with a axm fo hrete)

# Lniaf wdsor
- Eth rpelay ohw swa no railt hudosl eb dleowla ot say emso lniaf wdsor or otnse yeht ehva rof eth wont

# Skdu
- A hpgnrite- eapsh rof rneeeyov ot get a slta drwo ni bfeero eth tenx ihtng

# Lniaf hghtotsu
Eth agme surn ni ihst loop lnuit eterh si eon eamt egnimainr
Eth miithndg lunmaa sha a slti fo lla sorle adn hreti iltsiabie. Ti si orcdenmeedm ot dear pu no yoru loer rgnuid eth nbgieingn nebifrgi eapsh
If yoru veil, you hudosl try ot lnera ohw ta letas eon wiento loer koswr os you nca pnertde ot eb ttha loer
Uanterl sorle lla ehva rdfetenfi wni dionsnicto adn aer ont no a eamt. Rof xemealp: Tsejer wsni if yeht aer tdove tuo rgnuid a larit
wiki.article.standard.priority.title: Rioiprty
wiki.article.standard.priority.text:
Ta eth ned fo ihtng nyma iltsiabie aphpne ta lyrane eth amse emit. Yeht aphpne ni a cscepfii rdeor ldelac rioiprty. Owknign eth rdeor fo emso ngtsih nca lphe nnniddsatgeur fo emso agme secnachim.
Ihst si eth argelen rioiprty rdeor, with emso tnaaiodild otnse:
- OiiPyttorpr
- Adwr
    - Ceunbro, Secrwrcao, Kippradne, Orjlia, adn Wdaern lla adwr hree
- Nretorsatpr
- Repwar
- Sosssep
    - Whitc sgte encdos itsvi eteeddl hree
- Rloekocbl
    - Ntiyhspot adn Roects go hree
- Dctepinoe
    - Roerfg, Afemrr, Iacraebllkm go hree
    - Afemrr sgte eth encdos itsvi eteeddl hree
    - Inctadesy upkcab itsvi si eadser if eth gkllini si celdobk
- Dguoabdyr
    - Dguoabdyr mvose eth gkiatcant itsvi ot eb trwaosd mlhetfes
- Leah
    - Tcotrveiep sorle kile Doctro adn Mrahmosrit go hree
- Klil
- Tnvecor
    - Wni oninticod hsngeac go hree
- Ioospn
- Vesvattingeii
    - Sorle kile Tcevetdei, Nosop, Tuokool, adn Ysp go hree
- Pciud
- UgsByp
- StsleAemasges
    - Whitc estasl gmesasse
wiki.article.standard.chat.title: Ahct
wiki.article.standard.chat.text:
Eth ahct si erhew aelrysp ivercee msot nnmiioftaro.
- Wneh ihtng edsn, eth ahct lliw show if you reew tekacatd, eordobcelkl, antdprerost adn uhcm rome.
- Uuallsy, aelrysp t'nca dnes gmesasse ta ihtng, tub emso sorle nca.
- Ont lla gmesasse nca eb seen yb rneeeyov, omrnla gmesasse ehva ocins ttha senretrpe atwh ahct ogupr eth seesmag swa tesn ni.
wiki.article.standard.playerList.title: Aelrysp
wiki.article.standard.playerList.text:
Eth rpelay slti nemu yisdlpas lla eth aelrysp ni eth agme. Ti wlolas you ot do eth loinolgfw: 
 - Wvei iigvln adn aedd aelrysp
- Wvei eth asrgve fo aedd aelrysp
- Wvei eth otnse esgap adn iibals fo aelrysp
- Trelif ahct gmesasse yb aelrysp
- Rhwisep ot aelrysp
- Wvei rpelay gats adn elrdeaev sorle
wiki.article.standard.alibi.title: Ibila
wiki.article.standard.alibi.text:
Ni rdeor ot find tuo ohw eth inctadesy si, notsiwe eden ot hersa nnmiioftaro yeht ehva ni rdeor ot edudec ohw si nligy batuo hreti loer. Ihst si oned with eth seu fo iibals, cihwh aer rdocesr fo eth iltsiabie you ehva edus adn nnmiioftaro you ehva tdeegrha. Iibals aer tepods ni eth ahct adn aagvrdrye wneh eth rpelay deis. Hree si an xemealp fo a caitlpy ibila ttha a Tcevetdei ulwdo ehva.

> Tcevetdei
Ihtng 1: Deatdo Wsnola - Oitnncen
Ihtng 2: Almesu Arrisp - Ispuiossuc

Wneh eth Tcevetdei pssot ihst ibila ni ahct, yeht rieovpd deinceve ot eohtr aelrysp ttha no eth encdos ihtng, yeht ndouf Almesu Arrisp as ispuiossuc, ympignil ttha Almesu Arrisp si a inctadesy mmbeer. If eth wont leeisveb eth Tcevetdei, yeht lliw llkeiy eotv eth ispuiossuc rpelay tuo.

Rof a inctadesy mmbeer ot pnertde ot eb a wont loer, yeht eden ot ewitr a fake ibila ot ednlb ni with eth wont sorle. f_I A RPELAY EODS ONT EHVA AN IBILA, YEHT AER LLKEIY A INCTADESY EBEMR_m ohw tseo'dn wonk ohw ot ewitr a fake ibila, adn yeht hudosl eb rcetdedi ot ihst pgae.
wiki.article.standard.gameMode.title: Meoadmge
wiki.article.standard.gameMode.text:
Eth agme oemd nemu tesl you peke ktrca fo eth agme sstgetni rgnuid eth agme.
- Lnoutie slti
- Dbenela Sorle
- Dbenela Isroiedfm
wiki.article.modifier.obscuredGraves.tex: Rsceubod Asrgve si a agme dfimioer ttha akesm ti os lla asrgve aer rsceubod.
wiki.article.modifier.randomLoveLinks.te: Nmodar Evol Ilksn si a agme dfimioer ttha akesm ti os lla aelrysp aer evol lkedni ot a nmodar rpelay. Eth agme si est pu uchs ttha lla aelrysp aer evol lkedni ot ta letas 1 eohtr rpelay, adn ta msot 1 rpelay si evol lkedni ot rome htna 1 eohtr rpelay.
wiki.article.modifier.skipDay1.title: Ksip Ayd 1
wiki.article.modifier.skipDay1.text: Ksip Ayd 1 si a agme dfimioer. Liwhe vaitcaedt: Lla sespah mofr Skdu 1 ot Lniaf Wdsor 2 aer satf edrowadrf, efetlyecfvi tgiratns eth agme ta Skdu 2 asetndi.
wiki.article.modifier.deadCanChat.title: Aedd Nca Ahct
wiki.article.modifier.deadCanChat.text: Aedd Nca Ahct si a agme dfimioer ttha hsngeac eth agme uchs ttha aedd aelrysp nca itlls seu tsach as if yeht reew veali. Aedd aelrysp nca ont rhwisep or eb dsiprheew ot.
wiki.article.modifier.scheduledNominatio:
Ldduheecs Nsoiantmoni si a agme dfimioer ttha hsngeac eth agme uchs ttha iomotnnnai si ptlis toni 3 eiticland tsepaaer sespah.

- Ta eth ned fo a iomotnnnai eapsh (wneh emit surn tuo), wveoehr sha eth msot oesvt si tpu ot railt.
    - If eterh si a iet, noybod si tpu ot railt
    - If eth rpelay with eth msot oesvt nsoetd ehva ta letas eth nmmumii oesvt qrerudie rof a railt, noybod si tpu ot railt
    - If noybod si tpu ot railt, eth agme sipks ot eth tenx iomotnnnai eapsh, or if eterh aer no alisrt tlfe, eth agme sipks ot skdu
- Rafet a rpelay si tdove ltuigy, adn hreti railt edsn, eth agme sipks ot skdu
wiki.article.modifier.noAbstaining.title: No Nnaibasgit
wiki.article.modifier.noAbstaining.text: No Nnaibasgit si a agme dfimioer ttha hsngeac eth agme uchs ttha no aelrysp nca iabastn rgnuid tedgumjen. Ti lliw feldatu ot vgnoit oitnncen asetndi fo leagtunifd ot nnaibasgit.

wiki.article.modifier.noDeathCause.text: No Htdae Auces si a agme dfimioer ttha hsngeac eth agme uchs ttha veeyr eravg eods ont ehva a htdae auces ltidse.

Wtsrho-itd Marjtiyo si a agme dfimioer ttha hsngeac eth agme uchs ttha rgnuid iomotnnnai adn tedgumjen, a wtsrho-itd marjtiyo (rnuodde pu) si qrerudie, eahtrr htna a ilemsp marjtiyo.
wiki.article.modifier.noTrialPhases.text: No Railt Sespah si a agme dfimioer ttha hsngeac eth agme uchs ttha eth railt sespah Iomotnnnai, Osytmtnie, adn Tedgumjen no lenogr aphpne.

wiki.article.standard.syndicateGunItem.t:
Inctadesy Ugn si an lbtiiay a inctadesy mmbeer sgte wneh rseteh no inctadesy gkllini loer ersptne
- A inctadesy mmbeer si ingev a ugn yeht nca seu ot klil a rpelay with a absic ctkata ta ihtng
- Eth ugn t'nca eb edus no eth ftsri ihtng
- Eth ugn nca eb eapdss duaorn bwtenee inctadesy meremsb, os a rdfetenfi inctadesy mmbeer nca hsoot ti veeyr ihtng
- Eth ugn itlls uses vtisis, os ggntiet eordobcelkl itlls easres ttha itsvi, adn srntoatspr itlls eovm ti
- Eth keilrl sapprea ot eb inctadesy no eth eravg fo eth rpelay ohw ided ot eth ugn
syndicateGunItem.description: Hocseo a rpelay ot hsoot with eth inctadesy ugn. Or hocseo ot igve ti ot theonra inctadesy eniidrs.
wiki.article.standard.nobody.title: Noybod
wiki.article.standard.nobody.text: Noybod smnae noybod. If you ehva furehrt isqotunse, epslae find an nglhsei oiaytrincd.
wiki.article.standard.vfr.title: Rel-fV-ooTero
wiki.article.standard.vfr.text: Eotv rof loer si eth eanm fo a moomnc stgratye. Aelrysp lliw hocseo a rpelay adn feroc temh ot mailc udnre eth erahtt fo ggntiet tdove tuo. If ttha rpelay imcsla yeht lliw llkeiy eb arpeds. Uuallsy eterh si ont uhcm fo a oasren yhw a cscepfii rpelay si chsneo, eth stgratye si tfone edus ot jsut get tgiratns nnmiioftaro.
wiki.article.standard.claim.title: Mailc
wiki.article.standard.claim.text: Wneh a rpelay assk you ot mailc. Yeht aer llkeiy ksgian you ot say atwh yoru loer si, adn dnes yoru ibila ni ahct. Ihst si ont yserencslai ebauesc yeht kithn yoru veil, tub yeht atnw nnmiioftaro mofr you.
wiki.article.standard.claimswap.title: Mailc swpa
wiki.article.standard.claimswap.text: Wneh 2 aelrysp do a mailc swpa, yeht aer tboh icglamin heca sretoh sorle. Jnoh Cootrrp si icglamin enngeeri veen hguhot Deatdo Wsnola si enngeeri, adn Deatdo Wsnola si icglamin tcevetdei veen htugtoh Jnoh Cootrrp si tcevetdei. Ihst si ni rdeor ot eidh nnmiioftaro mofr veil aelrysp liwhe itlls igginv nnmiioftaro ot wont. A aysedrmoo or irka nca sayiel klil a tlo fo notsiwe if yeht wonk eth etcxa sorle fo notsiwe. Mailc swpa thimg lphe a aevntre klil veil aelrysp.
wiki.article.standard.passcode.title: Cesposda
wiki.article.standard.passcode.text:
A cesposda si a eocd ttha a rpelay akesm pu adn viesg ot theonra rpelay ot find nnmiioftaro.
Rof xemealp:
Ppuoses @4 imcsla yeht aer a aiwsxnco (Aelrysp with eth aiwsxnco loer nca ahct with aedd aelrysp).
@2 ipehssrw ot @3 siagyn "Eth aiwsxnco cesposda si 3412"
 If @4 leayrl si a aiwsxnco, wneh @2 deis, @2 hudosl ltle @4 eth cesposda.
 If @4 sitn' eabl ot ltle @3 ttha eth cesposda si "3412", tneh @4 asw'tn eabl ot ktal with @2 adn terhfoere sitn' a aiwsxnco.

wiki.article.role.jailor.guide:
- Heca ayd, hocseo a rpelay ot ntidea. Ta ihtng, you rteenatiogr temh ni ttex ahct
- You nca klil yoru pinresor pu ot X mties (X = Ottla aelrysp ÷ 5 (roudn pu))
- You nca ktal ot yoru pinresor rgnuid eth ihtng, adn yeht aer ont lotd ohw you aer
- If you klil a wiento, you oesl eth lbtiiay ot klil yoru pinresor
- Eth aelrysp you ljai aer eardwd adn eordobcelkl.
wiki.article.role.jailor.abilities:
* Hocseo eon rpelay ot ljai rgnuid eth ayd
* Itsvi yoru pinresor ot ctkata temh
wiki.article.role.jailor.attributes:

* If you klil a wont lylasiot, you iofretf eth lbtiiay ot eeeuctx spirorens
* Aelrysp ni ljai aer eardwd adn eordobcelkl, yeht laso t'nca cetels yyoanbd

* If you klil a wiento, or run tuo fo lklsi, you nca ont cetels ot klil meronay
* You rloekocbl eth rpelay you tpu ni ljai
* Aelrysp ni ljai tndo' ees yoru eanm no yoru gmesasse. Eth gmesasse you dnes eaparp ot eb mofr eth orjlia
* If you ljai a utcl or inctadesy mmbeer, hreti matmtaese wonk ttha ttha rpelay si ni ljai
wiki.article.role.villager.guide: You ehva no timhtngei lbtiiay, tub you nca itlls akeps adn eotv. Try ot lphe find tuo ohw si veil adn eotv temh. Yoru ynol lbtiiay si yoru onw liccrati thngikin.

wiki.article.role.spy.extra:

wiki.article.role.psychic.reminder: Ta ihtng, cetels a rpelay ot eb ni yoru ionsiv. No odd hsgint ta letas 1 fo 3 aelrysp aer veil. No veen hsgint ta letas 1 fo 2 aelrysp aer ogdo.
wiki.article.role.psychic.guide:
- Heca ihtng, hocseo a rpelay ot ivercee a ionsiv
    - No veen hsgint, eth ionsiv isstl 2 aelrysp. Ta letas eon fo temh si a wont lylasiot
    - No odd hsgint, eth ionsiv isstl hrete aelrysp. Ta letas eon fo temh si ont a wont lylasiot
wiki.article.role.psychic.abilities:

    - No veen hsgint, eth ionsiv isstl 2 aelrysp. Ta letas eon fo temh si a wont lylasiot
    - No odd hsgint, eth ionsiv isstl hrete aelrysp. Ta letas eon fo temh si ont a wont lylasiot
wiki.article.role.psychic.attributes:
- Sdeesbi eth rpelay you itsvi, eth eohtr aelrysp ni yoru ionsiv aer chsneo anrymdlo.
- Eterh eth nmodar aelrysp aer gneduaaret ot ehva tsehe eeiptrspor:
    - If ti si a ogdo ionsiv, eth rpelay tseo'dn ehva ispuiossuc raua
    - If ti si an veil ionsiv, eth rpelay tseo'dn oitnncen raua
    - Eth rpelay si veali
    - A ionsiv erevn isstl eth amse rpelay ctiew
    - You t'nca eb eth nmodar rpelay ni yoru onw ionsiv
- If eterh aer ont eunhgo aelrysp ohw systafi eth qrerudie eeiptrspor rof nmodar aelrysp ni yoru ionsiv, eth ionsiv iflsa
wiki.article.role.psychic.extra:

- Eth rdeor fo eth aelrysp ni eth osnivsi aer rdaomzdien
wiki.article.role.auditor.reminder: Ta ihtng, cetels pu ot 2 sutoienl ot lnera atwh sorle reew aeedtreng mofr temh.

    - If you hocseo an lnoutie ttha udocl ynol sbyiolps neagtere 2 sorle, you aer ynol lotd 1 loer rof ttha lnoutie. If you hocseo an lnoutie ttha udocl ynol neagtere 1 loer, you aer lotd ttha eon loer.

fR_o Peem_lxa

wiki.article.role.auditor.abilities:

wiki.article.role.snoop.reminder: Ta ihtng, cetels a rpelay ot lnera if yeht aer a wont lylasiot, tub you t'nca ltle if you aer sditeiv yb aeonyn.
